user: How many countries are related to the Bengali language?
So what kind of language is related to the Bengali language?
This is very interesting! In which other countries is the Bengali language located?
response: There are 10 countries with the Bengali language. Such as: Bangladesh, India, United Kingdom, United States, Pakistan, Oman, Indonesia, Brunei, Malaysia, and Singapore.
Bangla language has a unique position, occupying the fourth and top position, respectively, as a mother tongue and in written form, according to the world's population.
